review_title: Proud to be part of AHF
pros:
An organization with clear goals, permanently looking for internal input serving people's interests first. 
AHF delivers top class services and care for people living with HIV (and many other people as well) and definitely looks after its staff well-being warmly and honestly.
cons: Working while a pandemic affects the whole planet is not easy, particularly in third world countries. Even so, AHF has shown real commitment in looking after everyone.
